abstract: Community Board 4 recommended that Boxers not be allowed to open in Hell's Kitchen, but its letter to the liquor authority will include stipulations that would make it amenable to the enterprise.
snippet: Community Board 4 recommended that Boxers not be allowed to open in Hell's Kitchen, but its letter to the liquor authority will include stipulations that would make it amenable to the enterprise.

headline.main: After Lively Debate, Board Votes No on Gay Bar Near School
